articles.title: How old is the universe exactly? A new theory suggests that it's been around for twice as long as believed - The Conversation
articles.description: A new hypothesis suggests that the universe may be twice as old as we had believed. Observations from the James Webb Space Telescope provide new information on the rate of the universe’s expansion.
